column1: #Text=The starting materials used for the synthesis of R2Si2O7 (with R = Er,
#Text=Ho, and Tm) polycrystalline materials were rare-earth oxides, Er2O3,
#Text=Ho2O3 and Tm2O3 (all of 99.9% purity), and silica, SiO2 (99.6%).
#Text=Crystals of rare-earth silicate compounds were then grown using a
#Text=Canon Machinery Incorporated), equipped with two 1.5 kW halogen
